name: MIAZMA or the Devil's Stone
description: MIAZMA is the second Jonathan Hunt adventure, sequel to award-winning FMV title Yoomurjak’s Ring. The agile NY journalist embarks on a new investigation after a curious meteorite. What is inside the devilish stone? Is it a huge gem, a magic formula or a devastating substance?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 x2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 7 GB available space
